name: Poker Heroes: Brawl, Evolve, Dominate! BCG
name_original: Poker Heroes: Brawl, Evolve, Dominate! BCG
description:
Are you ready for world domination? Jump into the fray as you command a devastating squad of heroes in card-battling combat. To survive you need to build, train and upgrade your soldiers, defeat and capture your enemies and work with other commanders to achieve ultimate victory!

NOTE! Poker Heroes is free to download and play, however some items can be downloaded for real money. If you do not want to use this feature you may disable in-app purchases in your device settings. Also, per the terms of service, you must be at least 13 years of age to download and play Poker Heroes.

A network connection is required to play Poker Heroes.

In the not-too-distant future, Earth is caught in the crossfire between warring alien species fighting for dominance of our galaxy. In the epic battle that ensued, there were no victors and only a few survivors. Discovered amidst the wreckage were strange new technologies and powerful elemental materials that have taken warfare on Earth to a frightening new level.

In Poker Heroes, card battles pit your Team against waves of fierce enemies and ever increasing challenges. Play your strongest hand and watch the battle unfold in glorious first-person detail. Rain death and destruction upon your foes! Capture your defeated enemies and enlist them in the fight. Spend your hard-won loot to upgrade your forces. Your friend’s allied commanders will assist in your battles and share in the fruits of your victories.

FEATURES:
* Innovative poker based card-battling RPG game play
* Over 800 heroic characters to collect and evolve
* Over 100 story missions and dozens of daily events
* Compelling Player vs. Player battles
* Battle through unique 3D environments to defeat 30+ challenging bosses
* Three heroic factions with hundreds of powerful skills to use and master
* Challenge players online in rewarding player vs. player fortress battles
* Ally with friends during combat for shared glory and rewards
* Superior squad management interface makes upgrading and evolving a breeze
